Description: Fragment from rim of pottery mortarium. Clay yellow-beige, core light orange. Graffito on inside of rim: ]ολλ[ retrograde.
Curator's comments: Possibly from the same vessel as British Museum 1910,222.18 and 1886,0401.74.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 77)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 19.1.4) (Bernand's no. 38, p. 646, is 1886,0401.790, not 79)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (no. 7)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.09)
